td.content: s:M pilot aged 56 years complains of moderate nausea for 2 weeks. NKDA. o:Height 191 cm, Weight 66.2 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

s:white M pilot aged 56 years indicates moderate weight loss over several months, moderate nausea and moderate weakness. he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life drinks daily o:Height 191 cm, Weight 64.2 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 14 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Upper Endoscopy, CBC, Comprehensive Metabolic Panel, CEA.
